Review.Titre: Buffering more than some other Iptv…
Review.Contenu: Buffering more than some other Iptv service

Some channels your website says were available weren't.  I tried some of them and got the channel is offline message.  Other channels had sound but no picture or a picture but no sound.  Playback of other channels frequently stopped playing, displayed a reconnecting in 5 seconds message.  I know that problems happen on occasion, but shouldn't happen as frequently as they did when I had my free trial.  I won't be signing up.
Your services haven't been working for the past week. It shows a picture, no sound and that's it. Please help
